name: 2022 7th International Conference on Engineering Management
content: 2022 7th International Conference on Engineering Management (ICEM 2022) will be held in Guangzhou, China on September 23-25, 2022\. ICEM 2022 aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results in the field of Engineering Management. With the theme "Engineering Management", ICEM 2022 aspires to keeping up with advances and changes to a consistently morphing field. Leading researchers and industry experts from around the world will be presenting the latest studies through papers, keynote speeches and oral presentations.
